dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria, a realm of magic and wonder.

dialogue.speaker: Eryndor Thorne
dialogue.text: I am Eryndor Thorne, the last hope for our kingdom. The dark sorcerer, Xandros, has stolen the magical crystal that kept our land prosperous.

dialogue.speaker: Lila Earthsong
dialogue.text: I sense a great disturbance in the balance of nature. We must retrieve the crystal and restore harmony to our world.
